DOC.brief_summary: To assess the safety and effecacy of the Cypher stent ™ & Cypher Select ™ in the normal use of medical practices, within the labeled indications.
DOC.detailed_description: Multi-center, retrospective and prospective French register. This register does not impose any constraint on the evaluated population, the procedure, or the required examinations. The local practice routines should be applied.
DOC.criteria: Patients with symptomatic ischemic heart disease due to de novo lesions (lesions <30 mm vessel reference diameter of 2.25 mm to 5 mm), assessed visually, native coronary arteries. Patients suffering from coronary heart disease. Patients for whom treatment antiplatelet and / or anticoagulant is against the state; Patients with injuries incompatible with the full inflation of a balloon angioplasty; Transplant patients ; Patients with known allergy to Sirolimus, the stainless steel 316L, to polymethacrylates or copolymers polyolefins;
